column12:
① Please teach concretely the episodes that you can best understand your personality from the experience of your student days.
First of all, please fill in the title that you can understand at a glance the answer gist. 20 characters or less
column14: ① Please teach concretely the episodes that you can best understand your personality from the experience of your student days. 300 characters or less
column15: ① When I was in college, I raised TOEIC, which was originally 710 points, to 940 in 2 months. In the future, I wanted to become a human resource capable of discussing equally with businesspeople in various countries around the world, and I started studying TOEIC. Since I wanted to produce effects in as short a time as possible, I put emphasis on promoting learning efficiently. Specifically, I always listened to podcasts and reviewed wordbooks for traveling time and skimmer time. Also, keeping a habit of talking native with Skype everyday so as to secure 30 minutes before school, I continued learning. As a result, I could stretch 230 points in two months. Even now Skype English conversation is ongoing and studying on a daily basis by taking English classes for advanced people at university.
column16: Please describe your own idea what something you will need in the future (what needs to be strengthened or improved) so that Tokyo Gas will continue to be selected by customers. First of all, please fill in the title that you can understand at a glance the answer gist. 20 characters or less
column17: ① Price competition in gas liberalization
column18: ① Please describe your own idea what something will be needed (what needs to be strengthened or improved) so that Tokyo Gas will continue to be selected by customers. 300 characters or less
column19: In April next year, following the electric power, gas is also fully liberalized, companies and homes can buy electricity and gas in small amounts, so intense price competition involving power companies and oil companies It is expected to be broken. In this regard, looking at consumption of electricity, gas and oil in companies and households, only gas is increasing consumption since the 2011 disaster (Agency for Natural Resources and Energy), this trend will continue It seems to continue. In addition, since gas has higher energy efficiency than electric power, it also has an advantage in this respect. In general, however, electricity is set to be cheaper to use than gas, so Tokyo Gas has to set the price lower than competing electric power and oil companies in competing price competition.

column7: Tokyo Institute of Technology Graduate School
column12: Please describe the reason for participating in Tokyo Gas Summer Internship. (400 words or less)
column13: I would like to work on services that affect many people. I think that such a job has a dream and I feel worthwhile. For the above reasons, I began to be interested in energy related work. Because the energy industry is an industry that is closely tied to the lives of people, I have a big influence on the world and I felt it was a perfect job for me. Also, since energy related services are provided to many people, I believe reliability is very important for the quality of service. Your company is a representative of the energy industry, a company trusted by many people. I thought that knowing what I need to establish people's credibility by learning the knowledge of work at such a company wished for participation. We are committed to working on electricity business and I am convinced that learning about your company 's idea of ​​winning competition within the industry is of great significance to me.
column14: Please describe the reason why you chose this course (disaster prevention / supply design course). (400 words or less)
column15: Even if it says a sip to the energy industry, various work is under way in that shadow, I think that each one of these tasks plays a very important role. I thought that providing one of safe and stable services as one of those important roles was included. This is because such services are a way to trust your company and use the service everyday by people who use the service everyday without feeling anxious and using the service pleasantly so that your company has built up with people It is because it thought that it was indispensable to not destroy trust. The courses I wish to pursue are courses dealing with the business to provide you with safe and stable service to people and to learn the work necessary for your company to lead the energy industry to protect the trust you have gained from people It is a course that can be done. I experienced this course, I gained the power to contribute greatly to your company and society, I wanted to take part in further development of your company and society, and chose this course.
column16: Please tell us what you are doing with the most emphasis in student life. Also, what was acquired there? (400 words or less)
column17:
What I was working on with my most emphasis on my time as a student was my tutor. I was teaching in arithmetic. Before teaching, students had a deviation value in their forties, but before the examination they grew to such an extent that the deviation value of about 60 could be taken stably. In addition, although I could not accept it for the first desire of the four subject exams, I passed a mathematics examination to a junior high school of the same level. I myself have a strong feeling like my own exam, I can work on it, I feel that I was able to grow as a person. At that time, I learned how enjoyable it is to work for people, and if you can work happily you can do a very good job.
In addition, students' families were also allowed to work, we were able to raise our salary, and we were able to enjoy the pleasure of accepting work. I was noticed that money was paid as a consideration for the amount of work, but also important things that I got money as a proof of my trust in my work.
